azurerm_stream_analytics_output_serviceb.description: Manages a Stream Analytics Output to a ServiceBus Topic.

name.description: The name of the Stream Output. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group where the Stream Analytics Job exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

stream_analytics_job_name.description: The name of the Stream Analytics Job. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

topic_name.description: The name of the Service Bus Topic.

servicebus_namespace.description: The namespace that is associated with the desired Event Hub, Service Bus Topic, Service Bus Topic, etc.

shared_access_policy_key.description: The shared access policy key for the specified shared access policy.

shared_access_policy_name.description: The shared access policy name for the Event Hub, Service Bus Queue, Service Bus Topic, etc.

type.description: The serialization format used for outgoing data streams. Possible values are `Avro`, `Csv` and `Json`.

encoding.description: The encoding of the incoming data in the case of input and the encoding of outgoing data in the case of output. It currently can only be set to `UTF8`.
encoding.notes: This is required when `type` is set to `Csv` or `Json`.

field_delimiter.description: The delimiter that will be used to separate comma-separated value (CSV
field_delimiter.notes: This is required when `type` is set to `Csv`.

format.description: Specifies the format of the JSON the output will be written in. Possible values are `Array` and `LineSeparated`.
format.notes: This is Required and can only be specified when `type` is set to `Json`.

id.description: The ID of the Stream Analytics Output ServiceBus Topic.

create.description: Used when creating the Stream Analytics Output ServiceBus Topic.

update.description: Used when updating the Stream Analytics Output ServiceBus Topic.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Stream Analytics Output ServiceBus Topic.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Stream Analytics Output ServiceBus Topic.
